Articles.Content:
Beta Than Ever! I had to try the new tools and toys they made. And they are awesome! I tried to make something interesting, pretty stable and reasonably fast at the same time.. or something.

I listened the whole time to Fukkireta while making this plane, interesting results.

_____Basic Information_____

---------------------------------

Plane Name = Interestier

Max. Speed = over 1400 m/s (Depends on altitude)

Max. Altitude before IntakeAir Deprived = Around 25000m

Resources = LiquidFuel: 1550 ElectricCharge: 150 Monopropellant: 25 Oxidizer: 0/330 IntakeAir: 8

Maximum Crew = 2

Yaw is = Poor/Unstable

Pitch is = Ok

Roll is = Ok

Notes: You can add more intakes if needed. And remove front wings to make it look like bit different. SAS not required.

---------------------------------

_____Basic Information_____

_____Screenshots_____

---------------------------

http://imgur.com/a/I81se

---------------------------

_____Screenshots_____

Download

http://www./download/t501rd93re93rch/Interestier.craft

Have Fun!

Edited December 24, 2014 by Captain Krisu
Hi
That's a strange-looking plane. What's the most ideal place to attach a payload?

Quite the unique plane! I made one that looked similar to it, but in 0.24. I called it...

...the PlanetJumper!

BTW, if you want to add (imgur) images within the forums, try this:

[imgur ]I81se(this is the code from here: http://imgur.com/a/I81se#0)[/imgur ](remove the spaces, comments and rounded brackets)
Looks pretty! I've always been a fan of strange shaped planes. Keep it up!
